birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省北安县
birth_place.en: Bei'an County, Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 美国佛罗里达州奥兰多

description.zh-cn: 美籍华人传媒工作者、政评家和作家。政治立场偏向极右派，拥护保守主义，支持美国共和党，反对中国共产党、共产主义及社会主义。
description.en: A Chinese-American media professional, political commentator, and writer. His political stance is far-right; he supports conservatism, the US Republican Party, and opposes the Chinese Communist Party, communism, and socialism.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青的父亲。
description.en: Father of Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青的配偶。
description.en: Spouse of Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党一党专政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia governed by the Chinese Communist Party as a single party.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省哈尔滨市的一所综合性大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的唯一执政党。
description.en: The sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国的两大主要政党之一，通常被认为是中间偏右或右翼。
description.en: One of the two major political parties in the United States, generally considered center-right or right-wing.

description.zh-cn: 旨在建立一个主权独立的台湾共和国的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement aimed at establishing a sovereign and independent Republic of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华人作家。
description.en: A Chinese-American writer.

description.zh-cn: 一份曾在中国深圳发行的报纸，因发表挑战中国共产党一党专制的文章而于1987年被关闭。
description.en: A newspaper once published in Shenzhen, China, which was shut down in 1987 for publishing articles challenging the one-party rule of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代主要领导人。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 由曹长青于1989年在洛杉矶创办的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper founded by Cao Changqing in Los Angeles in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国持不同政见者。
description.en: A dissident of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、民主进步党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China and the Chairwoman of the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾四大报之一，政治立场偏向泛绿。
description.en: One of Taiwan's four major newspapers, with a political stance leaning towards the Pan-Green Coalition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统、中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China and the Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 民视新闻台播出的政论谈话性节目。
description.en: A political talk show aired on FTV News.

description.zh-cn: 流亡美国的中国商人，因被指控策划超过十亿美元的诈骗阴谋而被美国司法部逮捕。
description.en: An exiled Chinese businessman who was arrested by the U.S. Department of Justice for allegedly masterminding a fraud conspiracy exceeding one billion dollars.

description.zh-cn: 旅美华人牧师、时事评论员。
description.en: A Chinese-American pastor and current affairs commentator.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、赛车手和电影导演。
description.en: A Chinese writer, race car driver, and film director.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、评论家、历史学家和政治人物。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer, commentator, historian, and politician.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物及媒体人。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and media personality.

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离革命家、政治领袖和慈善家，曾任南非总统。
description.en: A South African anti-apartheid revolutionary, political leader, and philanthropist who served as President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、商人和媒体名人，曾任第45任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician, businessman, and media personality who served as the 45th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician serving as the 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、医师，曾任台北市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician who served as the mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的行政部门之一，负责执法和保障公共安全。
description.en: An executive department of the U.S. federal government, responsible for the enforcement of the law and administration of justice.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的独立机构，负责执行联邦证券法。
description.en: An independent agency of the United States federal government responsible for enforcing federal securities laws.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯政治人物，现任俄罗斯总统。
description.en: A Russian politician serving as the current president of Russia.

description.zh-cn: 《台湾苹果日报》总主笔。
description.en: Chief writer for Taiwan's Apple Daily.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，曾任民视常务董事，现为味王董事长。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur, former executive director of FTV, and current chairman of Ve Wong Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青是曹希晨的儿子。
description.en: Cao Changqing is the son of Cao Xichen.

description.zh-cn: 康尼是曹长青的配偶。
description.en: Connie is the spouse of Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青持强烈的反共立场，撰写大量文章批判中国共产党。
description.en: Cao Changqing holds a strong anti-communist stance and has written numerous articles criticizing the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青支持美国共和党所拥护的保守主义理念。
description.en: Cao Changqing supports the conservative ideals espoused by the US Republican Party.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青公开支持台湾独立运动。
description.en: Cao Changqing publicly supports the Taiwan independence movement.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青点名批评过的中华人民共和国持不同政见者之一。
description.en: One of the PRC dissidents publicly criticized by Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 自2017年郭文贵事件爆发后，曹长青力挺郭文贵爆料。
description.en: Since the Guo Wengui incident broke out in 2017, Cao Changqing has strongly supported Guo's revelations.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青点名批评过的中华人民共和国持不同政见者之一，并声称其反对郭文贵是因未收到资金或收取了中共资金。
description.en: One of the PRC dissidents publicly criticized by Cao Changqing, whom he claimed opposed Guo Wengui due to lack of funding or receiving money from the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青多次撰文批评蔡英文，并声称蔡英文曾施压《自由时报》撤下其专栏。
description.en: Cao Changqing has written multiple articles criticizing Tsai Ing-wen and claims that Tsai pressured the Liberty Times to remove his column.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青曾撰文抨击马英九的元旦祝词“睁眼说瞎话”。
description.en: Cao Changqing wrote an article criticizing Ma Ying-jeou's New Year's address as 'blatant lies'.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青在2010年曾撰文称赞韩寒挑战中共政府。
description.en: In 2010, Cao Changqing wrote an article praising Han Han for challenging the CCP government.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青在2019年声称韩寒造假，以抨击政府的方式帮助中共洗脑。
description.en: In 2019, Cao Changqing claimed Han Han was a fraud, helping the CCP brainwash people by criticizing the government.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年美国总统大选前，曹长青多次撰文批评川普，将他与希特勒相提并论。
description.en: Before the 2016 US presidential election, Cao Changqing wrote multiple articles criticizing Trump, comparing him to Hitler.

description.zh-cn: 在川普当选后，曹长青转为他的狂热支持者。
description.en: After Trump was elected, Cao Changqing became his fervent supporter.

description.zh-cn: 曹长青斥骂民主党候选人拜登，并散播关于他选举舞弊的阴谋论。
description.en: Cao Changqing criticized Democratic candidate Biden and spread conspiracy theories about his election fraud.

description.zh-cn: 《深圳青年报》因发表挑战中共一党专制的文章，于1987年被中国政府关闭。
description.en: Shenzhen Youth Daily was shut down by the Chinese government in 1987 for publishing articles challenging the CCP's one-party rule.

description.zh-cn: 由于抨击中共，中华人民共和国政府取消了曹长青的护照。
description.en: Due to his criticism of the CCP, the government of the People's Republic of China canceled Cao Changqing's passport.

description.zh-cn: 《深圳青年报》曾直接呼吁邓小平主动辞职下台。
description.en: The Shenzhen Youth Daily once directly called for Deng Xiaoping to resign and step down.

description.zh-cn: 据曹长青称，蔡英文曾打电话给《自由时报》高层，要求撤下其专栏，导致其停止为该报撰稿。
description.en: According to Cao Changqing, Tsai Ing-wen called the senior management of the Liberty Times to demand the removal of his column, leading him to stop writing for the paper.

description.zh-cn: 哈金与曹长青曾在黑龙江大学共同参与文学社团“大路社”。哈金在其小说《折腾到底》的扉页上，明确表示要将该小说献给曹长青。
description.en: Ha Jin and Cao Changqing were members of the 'Dalu Society' literary club at Heilongjiang University. Ha Jin dedicated his novel 'The Boat Rocker' to Cao Changqing.

description.zh-cn: 《台湾苹果日报》总主笔卜大中对曹长青给予正面评价，称其“进步神速”。
description.en: Bu Dazhong, chief writer for Taiwan's Apple Daily, gave a positive evaluation of Cao Changqing, praising his 'rapid progress'.

description.zh-cn: 时任民视常务董事的陈清福公开抱怨曹长青，称“看到那个脸我就转台”，并批评其高昂的节目钟点费。
description.en: Chen Qingfu, then executive director of FTV, publicly complained about Cao Changqing, stating 'I change the channel when I see that face,' and criticized his high program appearance fees.

description.zh-cn: 美国司法部于2023年3月15日宣布逮捕郭文贵，指控其策划超过十亿美元的诈骗阴谋。
description.en: The U.S. Department of Justice announced the arrest of Guo Wengui on March 15, 2023, charging him with orchestrating a fraud conspiracy of over one billion dollars.

description.zh-cn: 美国证券交易委员会指控郭文贵参与未注册和欺诈性发行，骗取超过八亿五千万美元的资金。
description.en: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charged Guo Wengui with participating in unregistered and fraudulent offerings, defrauding investors of over $850 million.
